name: BrainHealingSounds
0:
”Alexa, open brain healing sounds”
”Alexa, start brain healing sounds”
”Alexa, launch brain healing sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: brain healing sounds
des:
Brain Healing Sounds is a fantastic healing music to help you sleep, relax, meditate, relieve stress, or block out unwanted noises.

It is the best healing sounds for stress relief. This calm and relaxing sleep music can be used as background sounds, meditation music, relaxation sounds, relaxation music, peaceful music and as a sleep sounds.

By default, the sound will play until you stop it. To stop the music, say "Alexa, stop.” To resume it again, say "Alexa, resume."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
